oai_dc:dc.dc:title: NUMERICAL SIMULATION OF SAND IN PLUNGING BREAKERS
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Pedersen, C.
Deigaard, R.
Fredsoe, J.
Hansen, E.A.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: breaking waves
plunging breaker
numerical simulation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A discrete vortex model has been applied to describe plunging breakers. The wave breaking is represented by a jet of water impinging on the surface in front of the wave crest. The suspension of sediment has been modelled by a mixed diffusion - convection scheme. Preliminary results in the form of vector plots of the flow field and concentration profiles are presented.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 23 (1992): Proceedings of 23rd Conference on Coastal Engineering, Venice, Italy, 1992.
